data.body:
if you have a parent bead with lots of children, or a nested hierarchy, only send notifications when a parent is ready for verification.  Similarly, in final cut, don't include beats unless they either

- have no parent OR
- are a parent

this unclutters the finalcut count.

data.title: Don't count child beats for notifications and final cut
